org.jisonami.crypto

类 AbstractCryptography

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jisonami.crypto.AbstractCryptography
  • 直接已知子类:
    AbstractNonSymmetricCryptography, SymmetricCryptography

    public abstract class AbstractCryptography
extends java.lang.Object

    Created by jisonami on 16-10-15.

    加密解密抽象类，封装实际的加解密操作

    从以下版本开始:
    0.0.1
    作者:
    jisonami
    另请参阅:
    SymmetricCryptography, NonSymmetricCryptography, KeyAgreementCryptography

        返回:
